mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.content, c.user_id, c.like_count, c.dislike_count, c.heart, c.parent, c.modified_date FROM COMMENT c, VIDEO_POST v WHERE v.channel_id=#{channelId} AND c.video_post_id=v.id
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT SET heart="HEART" WHERE id=#{commentId}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(view_count) FROM VIDEO_POST WHERE channel_id=#{channelId}
